contest-event.event-date:
July 28, 1888 D Ingleton Contest
Ingleton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
ingleton-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Ingleton, North Yorkshire 4 bands competed 1st prize £24. 2nd prize £14. 3rd prize £7. 4th prize £4. March contest 1st (£3) Leeds Forge, 2nd (£2) Besses o th Barn, 3rd (£1) Carnforth.
April 25, 2012, 12:24 p.m. Oct. 30, 2019, 11:40 p.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Faust [Berlioz arr. Owen]
2 Leeds Forge Edwin Swift Beethoven's Works [arr. Swift]
3 Bentham Unknown Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
4 Carnforth T. Lewis Lyric Garland
